Detailed Description

Exposes methods to access hook information.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktHookInfo::Address ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Get the address of the hooked function.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the address.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHookInfo::CurrentProcess ( [out, retval] INktProcess **  ppProc)

Get the current process object.

Parameters
[in,out]ppProcA pointer to receive the process object interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on general failure.
HRESULT INktHookInfo::DbObject ( [out, retval] INktDbObject **  ppDbObject)

Get the database object associated with this hook.

Parameters
[in,out]ppDbObjectA pointer to receive the INktDbObject interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
HRESULT INktHookInfo::FunctionName ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the function name related to this hook.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to string to receive the function name.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
HRESULT INktHookInfo::Id ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Get the hook identifier.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to a pointer-sized variable to receive the identifier.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHookInfo::InvalidateCache ( [in] my_ssize_t  hDll)

Invalidates modules and exports cache.

Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHookInfo::SendCustomMessage ( [in] my_ssize_t  msgCode,
[in] my_ssize_t  msgParam,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_TRUE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pRetVal 
)

Send a custom message to the SpyMgr instance.

Parameters
pRetValThe returned value from the OnCustomMessage event. Only valid for synchronous messages.
msgCodeThe custom message code.
msgParamThe custom message parameter.
syncIf TRUE, the message is sent synchronously.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHookInfo::ThreadIgnore ( [in] LONG  theadId,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  ignore 
)

Adds or removes a thread from the global ignore list.

When a plugin DLL creates its own threads, this function can be used to force Deviare to ignore the API calls made from those user threads.

Parameters
theadIdThe thread id to add/remove.
ignoreIndicates if the thread should be ignored or not.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on general error.
